description.narrative: Communication support for UNICEF programmes, which contributes to Child Poverty / Public Finance For Children, Corporate External Relations And Partnerships, Communication And Resource Mobilization, Other Cross-Sectoral Programme Areas, Technical Excellence In Policy And Programmes. UNICEF aims to achieve this through Advocacy And Public Engagement, Systems Strengthening And Institution Building. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: Outcome 6: Cross-Sectoral on for multiple sectoral outcomes.

sector.narrative: Advocacy and partnership-building for social behaviour change
Child poverty public advocacy (media and social media, campaigns)
Country programme process (including UNDAF planning and CCA)
HQ and RO technical support on gender
Management of advocacy and communication at HQ
PF4C - domestic revenue mobilization and access to finance for key social services
Social protection and welfare services policy, planning and administration

description.narrative: Development Partner affairs Technical staff services
Development Partner affairs policy planning and administration
Social Protection, Land Housing and Community Amenities policy, planning and administration

condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents
